scripts.preview: npm run build && npx serve out
scripts.reinstall: rm -rf node_modules package-lock.json && npm cache clean --force && npm install
scripts.test:build: npm run clean && npm run lint && npm run type-check && npm run build
scripts.test:ci: npm run test:build && npm run preview:test
